description:
[Vaster Crows 3-Special Pack-]
- After clearing the first time, you can play the following world (20 hours to several hundred hours).
-After clearing the first time, increase ForceXP gained during kill (about 1.5 times).
-You can choose "individual battle" in the arena.
-Growth level is displayed in the soldier's "Battle Results".
-You can get special items after clearing the first time.
-Types of soldier markers + 4 types, etc.
name: VasterClaws 3 Special Pack
